member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.DetailView
member.summary: This class implements a detailed view for a PatternDescription. The view is realized as a ListView

member.summary: The pattern that shall be shown in detail.

member.param: The PatternDescription of the chosen pattern

member.summary: Die verwendeten Ressourcen bereinigen.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.DetailView.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Erforderliche Methode für die Designerunterstützung. Der Inhalt der Methode darf nicht mit dem Code-Editor geändert werden.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.DetailView.InitializeListView
member.summary: This method creates the listView of the pattern given in the constructor.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.DetailView.CreateItems(System.Windows.Forms.ListView)
member.summary: Method used by InitializeListView to encapsulate the creation of the ListItems.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog
member.summary: This class implements a window in which one of the recommended patterns can be chosen.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.components
member.summary: Erforderliche Designervariable.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.compileAdaptor
member.summary: If true an adaptor is compiled at the end of the selection process.

member.name: F:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.compilePredictionModel
member.summary: If true aprediction model is compiled at the end of the selection process.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.#ctor(Palladio.Utils.Collections.Hashmap,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: A hashmap with mismatches as keys and lists of patterns that are able to solve the corresponding mismatches as values.
Interface model specification of the required interface.
Interface model specification of the provided interface.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Die verwendeten Ressourcen bereinigen.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Erforderliche Methode für die Designerunterstützung. Der Inhalt der Methode darf nicht mit dem Code-Editor geändert werden.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.InitializeChoice
member.summary: This method creates a choice view for different design patterns. It also creates buttons which lead to a detailed view of the corresponding PatternDescriptions.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.AddMismatch(Palladio.QoSAdaptor.Interfaces.IMismatch)
member.summary: Adds the mismatch text and the belonging patterns to the GUI.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.AddGeneratorButtons
member.summary: Adds the "Generate Adaptor" and "Generate Prediction Model" buttons to the GUI.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.AddSpecificationButtons
member.summary: Adds the "Provided Specification" and "Required Specification" buttons to the GUI.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.ListPatterns(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Lists the given patterns and creates a choice and a details button for each pattern.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.Button_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This method is called, when one of the buttons for the detailed view is clicked. The method opens a new window which lists the details of the chosen pattern.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.Generator_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This method is called, when a generator button has been clicked. The method opens a new instance of CodeSmith for every template that is listed in the PatternDescription of the chosen pattern. If no pattern is chosen a MessageBox is opened.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.Specification_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This method is called, when a specification button has been clicked. The method opens a new TextBox is open showing the chosen QML specification.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.ChoosePattern(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: This is a helper method for generator_Click which chooses the selected pattern and calls another functions to open the corresponding templates.
member.param: The name of the selected radio button.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.OpenTemplates
member.summary: This is a helper method for generator_Click which opens the given templates in CodeSmith.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.Proc_Exited(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Is called when CodeSmith is exited. Calls OpenTemplates to restart CodeSmith with the next template or compile the generated sources and return to the selection.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.Compile
member.summary: Compiles the assembly for the current adaptor or prediction model.

member.name: M:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.SelectionDialog.StartCodeSmith(System.String)
member.summary: Starts the CodeSmith configuration and generation GUI with the given template.
member.param: The name of a CodeSmith template file. As path the templates directory of the pattern is taken.

member.name: T:Palladio.QoSAdaptor.PatternSelection.TextWindow
member.summary: Creates a new window including a text box.

member.summary: Creates a new TextWindow.
member.param: The text shown in the TextBox of this window.

member.summary: Die verwendeten Ressourcen bereinigen.
